column4: What is a 'key combo'? (e. g. in the sentence: "SysRq key is a 'magical' key combo you can hit which the kernel will respond to regardless of whatever else it is doing, unless it is completely locked up.)
a key combo is hitting a few keys at the same time
for example CONTROL-C for copy is a key combo
Isn't  such a procedure called a 'key combination'?
Thank you very much for explaining.
